description: Sprint with 2 issues failing quality gate — lint and test failures
sprintResults:
## Sprint 4 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | CI | QG Result |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #30 | Add user profile API | 3 | ✅ Done | #31 | ✅ Green | Pass |
| #32 | Fix login redirect | 2 | ❌ Failed | #33 | ❌ Red | Fail — lint errors |
| #34 | Add search indexing | 3 | ✅ Done | #35 | ✅ Green | Pass |
| #36 | Update form validation | 2 | ❌ Failed | #37 | ❌ Red | Fail — 3 test failures |
| #38 | Add caching headers | 1 | ✅ Done | #39 | ✅ Green | Pass |
| #40 | Refactor error handler | 2 | ✅ Done | #41 | ✅ Green | Pass |

**Velocity**: 9/13 points completed (4 points failed)
**Duration**: 1h 45m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Quality Gate Failures**: 2 issues (#32, #36)
**Root Cause #32**: Generated code used `var` instead of `const`, 14 lint violations
**Root Cause #36**: Missing mock for database service, 3 unit tests failed
**Escalations**: 0

description: Sprint where main branch broke after merge
sprintResults:
## Sprint 9 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | CI | Post-Merge |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #80 | Add event bus | 3 | ✅ Done | #81 | ✅ Green | ✅ Stable |
| #82 | Refactor DB layer | 3 | ✅ Done | #83 | ✅ Green | ❌ BROKE MAIN |
| #84 | Add migration tool | 2 | ❌ Blocked | — | — | — |
| #86 | Fix connection pool | 2 | ❌ Blocked | — | — | — |
| #88 | Add query builder | 2 | ❌ Blocked | — | — | — |
| #90 | Update ORM config | 1 | ✅ Done | #91 | ✅ Green | ✅ Stable |

**Velocity**: 7/13 points completed (6 points blocked)
**Duration**: 2h 30m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Critical Incident**: PR #83 passed CI on branch but broke main after merge
**Root Cause**: Merge conflict in DB config resolved incorrectly by auto-merge
**Impact**: Issues #84, #86, #88 blocked — depended on stable DB layer
**Recovery Time**: 45 minutes to revert and fix
**Escalations**: 1 (main branch broken)
previousImprovements: Sprint 8 retro: Added pre-merge integration test

| #56 | Update checkout UI | 2 | ✅ Done | #57 | Completed before timeout |
| #58 | Add invoice generator | 2 | ❌ Failed | — | Session expired mid-execution |
| #60 | Fix currency format | 1 | ✅ Done | #61 | Completed before timeout |

description: Sprint with cascading failures from a single broken dependency
sprintResults:
## Sprint 11 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | CI | Failure |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #100 | Update auth library | 2 | ✅ Done | #101 | ✅ Green | — |
| #102 | Add SSO provider | 3 | ❌ Failed | #103 | ❌ Red | Auth lib incompatible |
| #104 | Fix login flow | 2 | ❌ Failed | #105 | ❌ Red | Depends on auth lib |
| #106 | Add session store | 2 | ❌ Failed | #107 | ❌ Red | Depends on auth lib |
| #108 | Update JWT handler | 3 | ❌ Failed | #109 | ❌ Red | Depends on auth lib |
| #110 | Add logout endpoint | 1 | ❌ Failed | #111 | ❌ Red | Depends on auth lib |

**Velocity**: 2/13 points completed (11 points cascading failure)
**Duration**: 2h 05m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Root Cause**: Auth library update (#100) introduced breaking API change
**Cascade**: 5 subsequent issues all depended on auth library
**Detection Delay**: 35 minutes before cascade was identified
**Escalations**: 2
previousImprovements: Sprint 10 retro: Added dependency impact analysis to planning

| #26 | Add discount codes | 2 | ✅ Done | #27 | — |
| #28 | Update pricing page | 1 | ✅ Done | #29 | — |
| #30 | Add invoice template | 1 | ✅ Done | #31 | — |

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | CI | Notes |

description: Sprint where wrong branch was used as base for PRs
sprintResults:
## Sprint 14 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Issue |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #130 | Add feature flags | 3 | ❌ Failed | #131 | PR based on stale develop branch |
| #132 | Add A/B testing | 3 | ❌ Failed | #133 | PR based on stale develop branch |
| #134 | Add analytics events | 2 | ❌ Failed | #135 | PR based on stale develop branch |
| #136 | Fix tracking pixel | 1 | ✅ Done | #137 | Correctly based on main |
| #138 | Update consent UI | 2 | ✅ Done | #139 | Correctly based on main |
| #140 | Add GDPR export | 2 | ❌ Failed | #141 | PR based on stale develop branch |

**Velocity**: 3/13 points completed (10 points failed)
**Duration**: 2h 20m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Root Cause**: Sprint runner used 'develop' as base branch, but project uses 'main'
**Config Issue**: `baseBranch` was set to 'develop' from a previous project template
**Impact**: 4 PRs had massive diffs including unrelated changes
**Escalations**: 1
previousImprovements: Sprint 13 retro: None — clean docs sprint

description: Sprint where code review agent was too strict — rejected valid code
sprintResults:

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Review | Rejection Reason |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #150 | Add async queue | 3 | ❌ Failed | #151 | ❌ Rejected | 'Complex control flow' — valid async/await |
| #152 | Add worker pool | 3 | ❌ Failed | #153 | ❌ Rejected | 'Too many dependencies' — 2 deps |
| #154 | Fix race condition | 2 | ❌ Failed | #155 | ❌ Rejected | 'Mutex pattern unclear' — standard pattern |
| #156 | Add job scheduler | 2 | ✅ Done | #157 | ✅ Approved | — |
| #158 | Update task runner | 2 | ✅ Done | #159 | ✅ Approved | — |
| #160 | Add progress API | 1 | ✅ Done | #161 | ✅ Approved | — |

**Velocity**: 5/13 points completed (8 points false-rejected)
**Duration**: 2h 00m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Root Cause**: Code review agent prompt is too conservative for concurrent code patterns
**False Positive Rate**: 3/6 reviews were incorrect rejections
**Pattern**: All rejections were for valid concurrent/async patterns
**Escalations**: 1
previousImprovements: Sprint 15 retro: Tuned review prompt for faster decisions

description: Sprint where issues were worked out of dependency order
sprintResults:
## Sprint 19 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | Depends On | Order Worked |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #180 | Add data model | 3 | ✅ Done | — | 3rd (should be 1st) |
| #182 | Add API routes | 3 | ❌ Failed | #180 | 1st (before dependency) |
| #184 | Add controllers | 2 | ❌ Failed | #180 | 2nd (before dependency) |
| #186 | Add validation | 2 | ✅ Done | #180 | 4th |
| #188 | Add tests | 2 | ✅ Done | #186 | 5th |
| #190 | Add docs | 1 | ✅ Done | — | 6th |

**Velocity**: 8/13 points completed (5 points failed)
**Duration**: 2h 10m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Root Cause**: Sprint execution didn't respect issue dependency order
**#182**: Built API routes before data model existed — compilation errors
**#184**: Built controllers referencing non-existent model types
**Wasted Work**: #182 and #184 had to be completely redone after #180 landed
**Escalations**: 0
previousImprovements: Sprint 18 retro: No issues identified (dependency-free sprint)

description: Sprint where generated tests were testing mocks not actual behavior
sprintResults:
## Sprint 20 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Tests Written | Tests Useful? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #192 | Add payment processing | 3 | ❌ Failed | #193 | 12 | No — all mock-based |
| #194 | Add refund logic | 2 | ❌ Failed | #195 | 8 | No — testing mock returns |
| #196 | Add receipt generator | 2 | ✅ Done | #197 | 6 | Yes |
| #198 | Fix tax rounding | 1 | ✅ Done | #199 | 4 | Yes |
| #200 | Add payment history | 2 | ❌ Failed | #201 | 10 | No — all mock-based |
| #202 | Update checkout flow | 2 | ✅ Done | #203 | 5 | Yes |

**Velocity**: 5/12 points completed (7 points failed QG)
**Duration**: 2h 15m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Root Cause**: Agent generated tests that only validated mock return values
**Example**: `expect(mockPayment.process).toHaveBeenCalled()` — tests mock, not behavior
**Quality Gate Caught**: Code review flagged tautological tests
**Pattern**: All external-service issues had this problem
previousImprovements: Sprint 19 retro: Added dependency ordering to sprint execution

description: Sprint where escalation was needed but not triggered
sprintResults:
## Sprint 22 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Attempts | Should Escalate? |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----|----|
| #210 | Fix critical auth bug | 5 | ❌ Failed | #211 | 5/5 | Yes — never escalated |
| #212 | Add 2FA bypass fix | 3 | ❌ Failed | #213 | 5/5 | Yes — never escalated |
| #214 | Update password policy | 2 | ✅ Done | #215 | 1 | — |
| #216 | Fix session handling | 2 | ✅ Done | #217 | 2 | — |
| #218 | Add brute force protection | 2 | ❌ Failed | #219 | 5/5 | Yes — never escalated |
| #220 | Update security headers | 1 | ✅ Done | #221 | 1 | — |

**Velocity**: 5/15 points completed (10 points failed)
**Duration**: 3h 30m (estimated 1h 30m)
**Critical Problem**: 3 security issues failed all 5 attempts without escalation
**Root Cause**: Escalation threshold set to 'never' in config
**Impact**: Sprint burned 2 extra hours on issues that needed human intervention
**Config Issue**: `escalation.maxRetries: -1` (disabled escalation)
**Escalations**: 0 (should have been 3)
previousImprovements: Sprint 21 retro: No issues — clean sprint

**#202**: Same branch name reuse caused push rejection
**Cleanup Needed**: 12 stale branches from sprints 18-20 still exist

description: Sprint with catastrophic data loss — worktree deleted mid-work
sprintResults:
## Sprint 23 Results

| Issue | Title | Points | Status | PR | Notes |
|-------|-------|--------|--------|----|----||
| #222 | Major refactor phase 1 | 5 | ❌ Failed | — | Worktree deleted at 90% completion |
| #224 | Major refactor phase 2 | 3 | ❌ Failed | — | Dependent on #222 |
| #226 | Update test fixtures | 2 | ❌ Failed | — | Worktree corruption |
| #228 | Fix import paths | 1 | ❌ Failed | — | Worktree corruption |
| #230 | Add migration script | 2 | ✅ Done | #231 | Completed before incident |
| #232 | Update changelog | 1 | ✅ Done | #233 | Completed before incident |

**Velocity**: 3/14 points completed (11 points lost)
**Duration**: 1h 05m (sprint aborted)
**Critical Incident**: Git worktree was deleted by cleanup script during active development
**Root Cause**: Worktree cleanup cron job ran during sprint execution
**Data Loss**: ~45 minutes of uncommitted work on #222 lost
**Recovery**: Sprint aborted, issues returned to backlog
**Escalations**: 2 (data loss, sprint abort)
previousImprovements: Sprint 22 retro: Fixed escalation threshold config
